TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 321
TEI.2.document_title: Jose Justo Liendo to Stephen F Austin, 01-15-1830

barker_notes.barker_summary: José Justo Liendo to Austin, January 15, 1830. Power of attorney to sell 10 leagues of land which Liendo has acquired from the Government. (Omitted.)
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 321

div1.p: José Justo Liendo to Austin, January 15, 1830. Power of attorney to sell 10 leagues of land which Liendo has acquired from the Government. (Omitted.)
